section.name: License information
section.p: Joda-Collect source code is released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license. This is the same license as all Apache Software Foundation projects.

As is normal with the Apache 2.0 license, a NOTICE file exists for Joda-Collect:
Joda Collect Copyright 2001-2014 Stephen Colebourne
This product includes software developed by Joda.org (http://www.joda.org/).
